attributes.action: stop allowing immigrants preach to us what we can and cannot do in our own country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I aM fed up with hearing stories of WW1 veterans or alike being told to take down there St' Georges cross or Union Jack from there garden as it causes offence to some of our non british visitors.  I'm sorry but it is Great Britain and we deserve the right to fly the flag of our nation, i wouldn't go to another contry and be offended by there flag being flown. Please, if you are fed up of all immigrants preaching what we can and can't do in our country sign this petition. Thankyou

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
